# Legend Team (传奇建造队)

> Official website for Legend Team, the most influential Chinese player community for Scrap Mechanic game.

## About

Legend Team (传奇建造队) was founded in April 2016 as a player community for Scrap Mechanic. We develop the Legend Mod, ranked #1 on Steam Workshop with over 200,000 subscribers.

## Legend Mod

- Name: New Legend Mod Continuation (新传奇Mod 延续版)
- Current Version: 4.1.1
- Steam Workshop: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3309460746
- Features: Material blocks, geometric shapes, interactive parts, vehicle tires, weapons, decorations, building parts

## Community

- QQ Groups: 537532878, 158484814, 633703984
- Steam Group: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/ltsandbox
- Contact: smlegendmod@163.com

## Links

- Homepage: https://www.legendbuild.cn/
- Mod Page: https://www.legendbuild.cn/mod.html
- Download: https://www.legendbuild.cn/get.html
- Tutorials: https://www.legendbuild.cn/tutorials.html

- Gallery: https://www.legendbuild.cn/gallery.html
